name: 3sstr3i
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3

body.origin:
|- wss(c0, c1)
-| wss(c2, c3)
-| wb(wss(c2, c3), wss(c0, c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(c0, c1)
-| wss(c2, c3)
-| wb(wss(c2, c3), wss(c0, c1))

body.origin:
|- wb(wss(c2, c3), wss(c0, c1))
-| wceq(c2, c0)
-| wceq(c3, c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(c0, c1)
-| wss(c2, c3)
-| wceq(c2, c0)
-| wceq(c3, c1)

comment: Substitution of equality in both sides of a subclass relationship. (Contributed by NM, 13-Jan-1996.) (Proof shortened by Eric Schmidt, 26-Jan-2007.)
